item.title: Bangalore to Varkala Solo Trip Plan - Ultimate 3-Day Itinerary
item.description: A solo trip from Bangalore to Varkala is a perfect way to unwind and recharge. Varkala, a picturesque coastal town in Kerala, is famous for its cliffs overlooking the Arabian Sea, pristine beaches, backwaters, and spiritual significance. This journey combines scenic drives through the Western Ghats, serene beach experiences, cultural insights, and relaxation. Whether you are a solo traveler seeki
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Bangalore to Rameswaram (3 Days + 2 Nights, Trip Plan)
item.description: A road trip from Bangalore to Rameswaram is one of the most memorable long-drive experiences in South India. Whether you're a couple travelling on a bike or a family driving in a car, this 3-day travel plan covers everything you need — routes, timings, important stops, temple order, Dhanushkodi plan and safety tips. This upgraded travel guide helps you plan your trip without confusion,
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K

item.title: Bangalore to Trivandrum Solo Travel Plan
item.description: Traveling solo from Bangalore to Trivandrum offers a wonderful opportunity to explore the cultural richness, natural beauty and vibrant atmosphere of Kerala's capital city. Here's a solo travel plan for your trip: Day 1: Arrival in Trivandrum Arrive in Trivandrum by flight, train, or bus. Check into your accommodation and freshen up. item.title: Bangalore to Kovalam Solo Trip Plan

item.title: Bangalore to Kanyakumari Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Kanyakumari can be a fascinating journey, as you'll get to experience the diverse landscapes, cultural heritage and the meeting point of the Arabian Sea, the Indian Ocean and the Bay of Bengal. item.title: Bangalore to Madurai Solo Trip Plan
item.description: Solo trip from Bangalore to Madurai can be a fascinating journey, rich in history, culture and spirituality. Madurai, often referred to as the Athens of the East, is famous for its Meenakshi Amman Temple and vibrant street life.
